item.title: CTF Writeup: OWASP Juice Shop
item.description: Introduction This CTF is called “OWASP Juice Shop” and is on the TryHackMe platform. It focuses on the following security concerns from the OWASP Top 10: Injection, Broken Authentication, Sensitive Data Exposure, Broken Access Control and Cross-Site Scripting (XSS). Let’s get started. Task 1 This is simply spinning up the virtual machine and connecting to it through TryHackMe’s VPN. It is recommended to be familiar with Burp. Task 2 We do some basic reconnaissance: just walking the applicaion.
